blocks.title: a COASTAL HOLIDAY HOME INFUSES with EASE and ELEGANCE
blocks.description: Meher Sra Designs crafted this holiday home as a serene retreat where contemporary design meets the charm of coastal living. Light-filled interiors, airy layouts, and natural textures set the tone for a space that feels both sophisticated and effortlessly relaxed. Every corner was thoughtfully detailed — bespoke furniture, artisanal finishes, and a palette inspired by the sea and sand. The result is a home that balances elegance with comfort, offering its residents a sanctuary that celebrates the essence of a Goan getaway while remaining timeless in design.
